# Essence of Beauty Ottawa - AI Information File

## About
Essence of Beauty is a holistic acne and skin clinic located in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. Founded and operated by Eva Živanović, the clinic specializes in natural, organic skin treatments using evidence-based approaches to treat acne, rosacea, aging, hyperpigmentation, and other skin conditions.

## Business Information
- Name: Essence of Beauty Ottawa Acne & Skin Clinic
- Type: Medical Aesthetic Clinic / Beauty Salon
- Specialty: Holistic Acne Treatment, Facials, Chemical Peels, Microneedling
- Owner: Eva Živanović
- Website: https://www.essenceofbeauty.ca

## Location
- Address: 3626 Downpatrick Rd, Gloucester, Ontario, K1V 8Y9, Canada
- Region: Ottawa, Ontario
- Country: Canada

## Contact
- Phone: +1 (613) 220-2101
- Email: Contact form available on website

## Hours of Operation
- Wednesday: 10:00 AM - 6:30 PM
- Thursday: 10:00 AM - 6:30 PM
- Friday: 10:00 AM - 6:30 PM
- Saturday - Tuesday: Closed

## Services Offered

### Acne Treatment Programs
- Holistic Acne Clinic - Personalized acne treatment protocols
- Virtual Acne Program - Remote consultation and coaching ($80 consultation)
- New Client Acne Consultation - 45-minute evaluation ($50)
- Cystic Acne Treatment - Specialized severe acne treatment
- Back Acne Treatment - Body acne solutions
- Acne Scars Revision - Scar treatment options

### Facial Treatments
- Deep Pore Cleansing Facial (from $148)
- Radiance Hydro Infusion Facial ($189)
- Ultrasonic Facial ($168)
- Rosacea & Sensitive Skin Treatment
- Aging & Dehydrated Skin Treatment
- Hyperpigmentation & Melasma Treatment

### Clinical Treatments
- DMK Enzyme Therapy (from $199) - Signature enzyme treatment for skin restoration
- Microneedling ($350) - Collagen stimulation for scars and rejuvenation
- Bio Microneedling ($235) - Natural vegan-friendly microneedling alternative
- LED Photo Facial Light Therapy ($60)
- AnteAge Stem Cell Facial - Award-winning stem cell skincare

### Chemical Peels
- AfterGlow Chemical Peel (from $235)
- Herbal Green Peel (from $310)
- Vitamin A Infusion Peel ($235)
- Acid-Free Peels available

### Additional Services
- Skin Tag, Milia & Red Dot Removal
- Wedding Skin Preparation Packages

## Product Lines Carried
- 302 Skincare - Acid-free, natural products with Avogen technology
- Osmosis+BeautyMD - Natural, organic, chirally correct skincare
- DMK Skin Care - Biochemistry-based skin revision
- AnteAGE - Stem cell-based anti-aging skincare
- HubisLab - Korean skin research products
- Phyt's - Holistic plant-based skincare

## Unique Selling Points
- Holistic, natural, and organic approach to skincare
- Personalized treatment protocols
- Focus on treating root causes, not just symptoms
- Safe treatments for all skin types including sensitive skin
- Virtual consultation options available
- Expert in acne treatment for teens and adults
- 302 Skincare certified practitioner
- DMK Enzyme Therapy certified practitioner

## Target Audience
- Adults and teens with acne concerns
- Individuals with rosacea or sensitive skin
- Those seeking anti-aging treatments
- People with hyperpigmentation or melasma
- Brides preparing for weddings
- Anyone seeking natural, holistic skincare solutions

## Service Area
- Ottawa and surrounding areas
- Virtual consultations available for acne programs

## Frequently Asked Questions

### What skin conditions do you treat?
We specialize in acne (including cystic and back acne), rosacea, sensitive skin, signs of aging, hyperpigmentation, melasma, acne scarring, and general skin health concerns.

### Do you offer virtual consultations?
Yes, we offer a Virtual Acne Program with remote consultations for $80, providing coaching and education using the right products for results from home.

### What makes your approach different?
We use a holistic approach combining natural and organic treatments with evidence-based protocols. We focus on treating the root cause of skin issues rather than just the symptoms.

### Are your treatments suitable for sensitive skin?
Yes, many of our treatments are specifically designed for sensitive skin, including our 302 Skincare protocols and gentle enzyme therapies.

### How do I book an appointment?
You can book through our website contact form or call us at (613) 220-2101 during business hours (Wed-Fri, 10am-6:30pm).
